attributes.additional_details: So that it is more noticable and so that more people sign up for it
attributes.background: Get more trees planted, so that we have air to breathe and not just factories everywhere

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This is a matter for landowners. 

You could start a petition calling for the Government to fund a tree-planting scheme, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
